case.title: The most fun you will ever have making $$$ - 40 (Upper East Side)
case.text:
Why work this summer, I am much more fun and will give you $$$ .
I am white 40 in good shape 6ft tall clean cut and nice.
You be white Asian Spanish 18 -30 and busty I will offer 400 per meeting.
No pics no reply no pros
